<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform ; Audio out Audio in No messages -odac -iadc ;;;-d RT audio I/O ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o pvsarp.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
; Initialize the global variables. sr = 44100 ksmps = 100 nchnls = 1 0dbfs = 1
instr 1 asig in ; get the signal in idepth = p4
fsig pvsanal asig, 1024, 256, 1024, 1 ; analyse it kbin oscili 0.1, 0.5, 1 ; ftable 1 in the 0-1 range ftps pvsarp fsig, kbin+0.01, idepth, 2 ; arpeggiate it (range 220.5 - 2425.5) atps pvsynth ftps ; synthesise it
out atps endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore> f 1 0 4096 10 1 ;sine wave
i 1 0 10 0.9 i 1 + 10 0.5 e
</CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
